summary: Layout Preview & Icon Customization Feature - All tests passed. Backend: 14/14 tests pass (GET /api/ticker/layout-icons returns all 4 layouts with mosaic_community having 6 default icons, GET /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons returns defaults/custom/resolved structure, PUT /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons/mosaic_community persists icon changes). Frontend: Landing page renders all 6 cultural nav icons (PinPan, Tienda, Ranking, Aprender, Cultura, Fe) using dynamic data from backend via useLayoutIcons hook. Mosaic grid tiles and info cards render correctly. Bottom navigation functional. Admin panel requires LaoPan OAuth authentication - cannot test authenticated admin panel directly, but code review confirms LayoutPreviewModule is properly integrated into AdminModule with layouts-tab data-testid.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/ticker/layout-icons returns 200
Backend: Layout icons response has all 4 layouts (mosaic_community, living_grid, cinematic, horizon)
Backend: mosaic_community has 6 default icons
Backend: Each icon has required fields (key, label, to, type, icon, accent, accent_bg)
Backend: All 6 cultural nav icon keys present (pinpan, tienda, ranking, aprender, cultura, fe)
Backend: GET /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons returns 200
Backend: Admin response has defaults, custom, resolved structure
Backend: Admin resolved matches public API data
Backend: GET /api/public/ui-style returns 200
Backend: Active layout is mosaic_community
Backend: PUT /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons/mosaic_community returns 200 with status ok
Backend: PUT persists changes and GET reflects updated icons
Backend: GET /api/ticker/landing-images returns 200
Backend: All mosaic image keys present (mosaic_pingpong_chess, mosaic_kids_learning, mosaic_culture, mosaic_gathering)
Frontend: Mosaic landing page loads [data-testid='mosaic-landing']
Frontend: Cultural nav renders [data-testid='cultural-nav']
Frontend: All 6 cultural nav icons visible (pinpan, tienda, ranking, aprender, cultura, fe)
Frontend: Mosaic grid renders [data-testid='mosaic-grid']
Frontend: All 4 mosaic tiles render (pingpong-chess, kids, culture, gathering)
Frontend: All 4 info cards render (store, rapid, events, players)
Frontend: Footer visible [data-testid='mosaic-footer']
Frontend: Bottom navigation functional [data-testid='bottom-nav']
Frontend: PinPan nav navigates to /pinpanclub
Frontend: Store card navigates to /unatienda
Frontend: Bottom nav Store navigates to /unatienda
Frontend: Mobile view renders correctly with responsive layout
critical_code_review_comments: LayoutPreviewModule.jsx is well-structured with proper component separation (IconPicker, IconRow)
ICON_CATALOG and ICON_NAMES provide 50+ Lucide icons for the picker
useLayoutIcons hook correctly fetches from /api/ticker/layout-icons and falls back to defaults
MosaicCommunityLanding correctly uses dynamicIcons with fallback to DEFAULT_NAV_ICONS
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Admin panel requires OAuth authentication - cannot test directly but code structure is correct

test_credentials.admin: LaoPan OAuth required - no password-based login available

seed_data_creation: None required - using existing layout icons configuration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 93 tested Layout Preview & Icon Customization feature. Backend APIs: GET /api/ticker/layout-icons (public), GET /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons (admin), PUT /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons/{layout_id} (update icons). Frontend: LayoutPreviewModule at /app/frontend/src/modules/admin/LayoutPreviewModule.jsx adds 'Layouts & Icons' tab to admin panel (data-testid='layouts-tab'). MosaicCommunityLanding uses useLayoutIcons hook to fetch dynamic icons. Admin panel requires LaoPan OAuth authentication so cannot test icon editor UI directly, but all backend APIs work correctly and landing page renders icons from backend. Key data-testids: layouts-tab, layout-cards, layout-card-{layout_id}, icon-editor, add-icon-btn, save-icons-btn, icon-picker.
